data.text: God, the all-powerful one, speaks;
His glory shines from Zion Hill in Jerusalem,
Our God comes to us,
He comes to judge his people.
He says, “Summon those who faithfully worship me,
The angels in heaven declare,
God says, “My people, listen!
I am not rebuking you for making sacrifices to me,
But I do not really need you to sacrifice
because all the animals in the forest belong to me,
I own and know all the birds
So, if I were hungry, I would not tell you to bring me some food,
I do not eat the flesh of the bulls that you sacrifice,
The sacrifice that I really want is that you thank me
And pray to me when you have troubles.
But I say this to the wicked people:
because you have refused to allow me to discipline you,
Every time that you see a thief, you become his friend,
You are always talking [MTY] about doing wicked things,
You are always accusing members of your own family of doing wrong,
You did all those things, and I did not say anything to you,
So, all you who have ignored me, pay attention to this,
The sacrifice that truly honors me is to thank me for what I have done;
